txt.en: 'More iron for the beast! Keep it coming, whelp!'

'Well, the War-tyrant isn't satisfied with just oil. He wants iron, he says, for the oil.

'My head swims a moment, and I realize what he's saying. We need ore, iron ore to build a great iron belly to house the oil. Then we'll heat the oil and douse those wretches. Cooked meat for all!

'We know that the Isendeep Mine houses a great deal of ore. Go there, or if you think it too far a trek, find the dwarves. Those bearded slugs carry the ore sometimes.'
'This will do nicely, get others to the task so we can build the iron belly and cook us some meals.'
'Get to work, slug. I'm not in the habit of taking kindly to those who shirk their duties!'
The Free Peoples will return to take Tol Ascarnen, and Angmar's defenders wish to strengthen the walls with deterents that will drive the foe away.
Deliver the ore to Soldier Glat at Tol Ascarnen

Iron ore can be found on the dwarves who fight for the Free Peoples or from the Isendeep Mine to the north.\n\nAngmar's army is shoring up the defences at Tol Ascarnen. Glat intends to build a massive iron pot to heat oil with which to douse the Free Peoples who attempt to assail the keep.
